# gitbook-plugin-codepens
A gitbook plugin for codepen

### How to use it?

for example:

codepen url: https://codepen.io/halaproliu/pen/GRKyvaz

like this:

```js
[](codepen://halaproliu/GRKyvaz?height=268&defaultTab=css,result)
```

```js
"plugin": ["codepen"],
"pluginConfig": {
  "codepen": {
    "height": 400,
    "theme": 14038,
    "description": "somepen",
    "defaultTab": "html"
  }
}
```
